巨星墜つ: (きょせいおつ) - death of a great man; the fall of a great star
巨材: (きょざい) - big timber; big caliber (man) (calibre)
巨篇: (きょへん) - great (literary) work; long novel or film
巨細: (こさい) - large and small matters; particulars; details; greatness and smallness; circumstances
巨編: (きょへん) - great (literary) work; long novel or film
巨蟹宮: (きょかいきゅう) - Cancer (4th zodiacal sign); the Crab
巨賊: (きょぞく) - big-time bandit; big-time pirate
巨赤芽球性貧血: (きょせきがきゅうせいひんけつ) - {med} megaloblastic anemia
巨頭: (おおあたま) - large head; person with a large head
巨頭鯨: (ゴンドウクジラ) - larger whales of family Delphinidae (esp. the pilot whales or blackfish)
巫女: (ふじょ) - {Shinto} miko/shrine maiden/young girl or woman (trad. an unmarried virgin) who assists priests at shrines; medium/sorceress/shamaness
巫女舞: (みこまい) - shrine maiden's ceremonial dance (in kagura)
巫子: (みこ) - {Shinto} miko/shrine maiden/young girl or woman (trad. an unmarried virgin) who assists priests at shrines; medium/sorceress/shamaness
巫山戯: (ふざけ) - play; sport; romp; frolic; joke; prank
巫山戯る: (ふざける) - to joke/to jest/to kid/to josh; to make fun of/to laugh at/to play a prank; to romp/to gambol/to frolic/to frisk/to mess around/to fool around/to screw around; to neck/to make out
巫祝: (ふしゅく) - shrine maiden; ancient priest
巫者: (ふしゃ) - virgin consecrated to a deity; shrine maiden; (spiritualistic) medium
差しぐむ: (さしぐむ) - to be moved to tears
差しだす: (さしだす) - to present; to submit; to tender; to hold out
差しつかえなければ: (さしつかえなければ) - if it's alright; if you don't mind my asking; if it's all the same to you
差しつける: (さしつける) - to point (gun at); to hold under one's nose
差しつ差されつ: (さしつさされつ) - exchanging sake cups
差しで: (さしで) - face to face; between two persons
差し上げ: (さしあげ) - carrying a portable shrine with arms stretched out (i.e. without shouldering it)
差し上げる: (さしあげる) - to give/to offer; to lift up/to hold up/to raise
差し上る: (さしのぼる) - to rise (e.g. sun, moon)
差し付ける: (さしつける) - to point (gun at); to hold under one's nose
差し伸べる: (さしのべる) - to hold out/to extend (e.g. one's hands)/to stretch/to reach out for; to thrust (javelin); to offer (e.g. aid, help, etc.)
差し入れ: (さしいれ) - insertion/letter drop; things sent to a prisoner; supply of provisions, refreshments, etc. to someone carrying out a task
差し入れる: (さしいれる) - to insert; to put in
差し出がましい: (さしでがましい) - forward; officious; impertinent; intrusive
差し出す: (さしだす) - to present; to submit; to tender; to hold out
差し出る: (さしでる) - to be forward/to stick one's nose into/to meddle/to be intrusive; to jut out/to protude/to overhang
差し出口: (さしでぐち) - uncalled-for or impertinent remark
差し前: (さしまえ) - sword worn at one's side
差し合い: (さしあい) - hindrance; offense; offence; prohibition
差し向かう: (さしむかう) - to be face to face
差し向ける: (さしむける) - to send or direct a person to
差し含む: (さしぐむ) - to be moved to tears
差し回す: (さしまわす) - to send around (e.g. a car)
差し固める: (さしかためる) - to close or shut tight; to warn sharply
差し土: (さしつち) - adding soil to a flowerbed
差し声: (さしごえ) - {music}  section of recitative (esp. in Noh music)
差し延べる: (さしのべる) - to hold out/to extend (e.g. one's hands)/to stretch/to reach out for; to thrust (javelin); to offer (e.g. aid, help, etc.)
差し引き: (さしひき) - deduction/subtraction/balance; ebb and flow/rise and fall
差し引き勘定: (さしひきかんじょう) - balance (of an account); striking a balance
差し引く: (さしひく) - to deduct/to take away/to dock; to make allowances for something/to bear something in mind; to ebb and flow
差し当たって: (さしあたって) - for the present; for the time being; at present; in the meantime
差し当たり: (さしあたり) - for the time being/at present; hindrance
差し当たる: (さしあたる) - to face the situation
差し当る: (さしあたる) - to face the situation
差し戻す: (さしもどす) - to send back; to refer back
差し手: (さして) - {sumo} slipping one's hand beneath the opponent's arm and latching on to the underside of his belt
差し手争い: (さしてあらそい) - {sumo} struggling to grab hold of one's opponent's belt with one's dominant hand
差し押える: (さしおさえる) - to seize; to impound; to garnish; to attach goods
差し押さえる: (さしおさえる) - to seize; to impound; to garnish; to attach goods
